market_mood: Bulls are charging into the crypto arena, but those bear traps are lurking!
astro_justification: With the Sun in expanding Sagittarius and the Moon in stable Taurus, traders feel optimistic yet cautious, bolstered by a supportive Mercury managing harmonious trines with Jupiter and Saturn.

BTC.reason: The bull run feels strong with cosmic energy aligning.

ETH.reason: Ethereum is floating up thanks to positive market sentiment and solid tech support.

ALTS.reason: Altcoins are struggling to keep up as the focus remains on major assets in this bullish phase.

quote: Cosmic winds are at our backs, but keep your eyes peeled for market hiccups!
